posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
We’re releasing the Signal 7.29 beta soon. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group here . If you’d like to get releases even faster, try out Obtainium!

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

No new notes, mostly bug fixes and non-visible changes!

Complete list of new commits since 7.28.4
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.28.4…main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

If you previously had the bug where long messages were being incorrectly chopped off (i.e. no “Read more” when there should be), please let me know if it’s resolved!

link_counts.title: Get the latest Android releases even faster with Obtainium
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.68 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.29.0 (149700)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

52 new commits since 7.28.4:

Show commits

  • Treat all groups updates as directionless for backupv2. [1]

  • Remove Mockito dependency from project. [2]

    Resolves #13838

  • Fix gv1 updates in backupv2. [3]

  • Fix empty profile names during backupv2 export. [4]

  • Move from AssertJ to AssertK. [5]

    Resolves #13841

  • Fix dangling call ringers. [6]

  • Isolated tests for RecurringInAppPaymentRepository. [7]

  • Add verification metadata for windows. [8]

  • Don't show linked device bottom sheets if you've seen them before. [9]

  • Add internal UI for importing backup with different credentials. [10]

  • Improve internal backup import UI tool. [11]

  • Implement initial support for IAP data. [12]

  • Upgrade to AGP 8.7.2 [13]

  • Upgrade to AGP 8.7.3 [14]

  • Isolated tests for OneTimeInAppPaymentRepository. [15]

  • Move some things to lib.versions.toml [16]

  • Add AAPT metadata for witness verification. [17]

  • Use more plugin aliases. [18]

  • Upgrade to kotlin 2.1.0 [19]

  • Update a bunch of libraries. [20]

  • Update compileSdk to 35. [21]

  • Add .kotlin to gitignore. [22]

  • Update more libraries. [23]

  • Ensure that the V262 database migration runs. [24]

  • Update our base themes to avoid crashing MaterialAlertDialog. [25] (reverted by [45])

  • Revert "Improve table display in Spinner." [26]

  • Fix cutoff string in help section. [27]

  • Fix typo in sql query. [28]

  • Add trigger definitions to logs. [29]

  • Capitalize log section title. [30]

  • Fix small gap in call menu. [31]

  • Update string translation comments. [32]

  • Fix leaked refreshActiveSubscription disposable. [33]

  • Fix ability to share text stories. [34]

    Fixes #13855
    Resolves #13879

  • Initialize database error handler with application instance. [35]

  • Fix text overflow length calculation. [36]

  • Fix overflow handling in condensed mode. [37]

  • Ensure filter is not retriggered when formatting. [38]

    Fixes #13876

  • Fix proximity sensor for voice notes. [39]

  • Ensure new manifest is saved after rotation. [40]

  • Inline and enable the SSRE2 config. [41]

  • Exclude unregistered group members from invalid collisions check. [42]

    Fixes #13866

  • Stop in-chat notification sounds if notifications are disabled. [43]

  • Fix bug showing null string on empty search. [44]

    Fixes #13854
    Resolves #13878

  • Revert "Update our base themes to avoid crashing MaterialAlertDialog." [45] (reverts [25])

  • Add missing required material3 dialog theme attribute. [46]

  • Disable the SSRE2 capability for now. [47]

  • Fix benchmark build. [48]

  • Add loading state to toggle switch and enforce when changing call link admin settings. [49]

  • Update translations and other static files. [50]

  • Update baseline profile. [51]

  • Bump version to 7.29.0 [52]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.28.4…v7.29.0

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

aapt2-8.4.1-8.4.1: this time the Windows version was included.
Upgrade to AGP 8.7.2: the windows version is missing (only the Linux version was present, MacOS also missing but since it isn’t used that matters not).
Upgrade to AGP 8.7.3: a build error because the windows version is missing…

Please add:

posts.name: anon53652
posts.cooked:
Very strange. I have a simple test phone, a Logicom Wave 2 with Android 14 GO (for devices with limited memory). Signal 7.28.4 installed and works OK on it, when I want to install 7.29.0 I get “this app is not compatible with your device” error. No time to investigate more now but I’ll just want to have it reported.

Edit: my fault, trying to install an armv8 apk on an armv7 device. Sorry.

posts.name: Klint
posts.cooked: Long texts with url are pasted well now, thanks!

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release

These will all be resolved in 7.29.0

updates-bot:
  • Fix text overflow length calculation. [36]
  • Fix overflow handling in condensed mode. [37]

Short messages still trigger Read more, just as in the scheduled and reply examples. It now triggers at about three lines as opposed to one.

Are these examples meant to trigger at a different threshold to a regular message?

This is still present, I’m sorry I didn’t mention before.

When an image, without text, hasn’t been downloaded it messes replies up.

This happens once a message that quotes the image is then also quoted.

1662×1500 111 KB

I don’t know why it’s up the screen like that. There was no keyboard involvement.

posts.cooked:
I can’t schedule messages. When I try to choose a date, the app either crashes completely or the flow crashes back to the chat list.

Log

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.29.0/92bf02bb3538fedf9f9a0d4add3660a6dd879318324a593514d604689ec23891

Maybe related to the read more fixes?

Continuing the discussion from Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release:

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release

Probably related; the same thing (has always) happened with replies.

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release

Unexpected read more when scheduling a message.

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.28 release

Hello. Long pasted messages (like long articles) are being truncated in 7.28.4

These will all be resolved in 7.29.0, which I’m hoping to take to beta today. Thanks!

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
waltz:

Are these examples meant to trigger at a different threshold to a regular message?

Yep! The text is condensed down there so we have more strict rules. In 7.28.4 it was too strict, truncating after a few characters. The first message should be truncated at 3 lines.

Avitus:

I can’t schedule messages. When I try to choose a date, the app either crashes completely or the flow crashes back to the chat list.

Salt:

Digging the hot pink, but I’m guessing it’s unintentional lol

Unfortunately both consequences of a botched material theme library update. I believe I have them fixed for the 7.29.1 release.

New Version: 7.29.1 (149800)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

9 new commits since 7.29.0:

  • Add proper toast message when call link in use. [1]

  • Reapply "Update our base themes to avoid crashing MaterialAlertDialog." [2]

  • Revert "Add missing required material3 dialog theme attribute." [3]

  • Fix various Material3 theming issues. [4]

  • Update aapt2 gradle hash for windows. [5]

  • Fix bug with re-opting into PINs. [6]

  • Update translations and other static files. [7]

  • Update baseline profile. [8]

  • Bump version to 7.29.1 [9]

posts.cooked:
Cannot make a video with the built-in camera. Long pressing button when camera is open looks like it is starting video recording, but get a “camera unavailable” pop up message too. And then nothing happens. Pressing the button again takes a picture instead.

Debug log
